src:
Iwan Bule Berkomitmen Meneruskan Program Pengurus PSSI Lama
03 Nov 2019, 16:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pengurus baru PSSI sudah terbentuk melalui Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) yang berlangsung di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta Pusat, Sabtu (2/11/2019). Selama empat tahun kedepan, federasi sepak bola di Tanah Air itu akan dipimpin oleh Mochamad Iriawan.
Dalam pidato perdananya sebagai ketua umum (ketum), Iwan Bule, sapaan akrab Mochamad Iriawan berharap agar PSSI dibawah kepemimpinannya bisa lebih baik. Dia juga menegaskan akan melanjutkan program-program dari pengurus sebelumnya.
"Sudah ada ketua, dua wakil ketua, dan 12 Exco. Semoga pimpinan ini barokah dan bisa bekerja maksimal untuk sepak bola Indonesia. Tentu saya dan kawan-kawan akan melaksanakan amanah ini dengan penuh tanggung jawab dan ikhlas demi sepak bola Indonesia," ujar Iwan Bule.
"Saya dan kawan-kawan berkomitmen meneruskan program dari pengurus terdahulu," katanya menambahkan.

text:
Iwan Bule Committed to Continuing the Old PSSI Management Program
Nov 3 2019, 16:50 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The new PSSI management has been formed through an Extraordinary Congress (KLB) which took place at the Shangri-La Hotel, Central Jakarta, Saturday (11/02/2019). For the next four years, the football federation in the country will be led by Mochamad Iriawan.
In his inaugural address as chairman (ketum), Iwan Bule, Mochamad Iriawan's familiar greeting hoped that PSSI under his leadership could be better. He also stressed that he would continue the programs of the previous management.
"There is already a chairman, two deputy chairs, and 12 Exco. Hopefully this leader is blessed and can work optimally for Indonesian football. Of course my friends and I will carry out this mandate with full responsibility and sincerity for the sake of Indonesian football," said Iwan It does not mean Caucasians and well you Indonesians know it.
"My friends and I are committed to continuing the program from the previous management," he added.
